mapper.insert: INSERT INTO emoticon_user (emo_user_no, emo_user_date, emo_no, ${timeline_col}, mem_id) VALUES (#{emo_user_no}, sysdate, #{emo_no}, #{timeline_no}, #{mem_id})
mapper.select: SELECT eu.* , (SELECT mem_nick FROM member m WHERE m.mem_id = eu.mem_id) as mem_nick , (SELECT emo_name FROM emoticon e WHERE e.emo_no = eu.emo_no) as emo_name FROM emoticon_user eu WHERE ${timeline_col} = #{timeline_no}
